price: Sana booda warra Rabbiin sodaatan nagaa baafna; warra miidhaa hojjatan immoo ishee keessatti jilbiiffatoo taasifnee (isaan) dhiifna.
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
